items.question: How much do Malaquias Accounting services cost?
items.answer: Prices vary according to company size and contracted services. We offer plans starting at $60/month for small businesses and customized rates for larger companies. Contact us for a personalized quote.

items.question: Do you serve companies across the entire country?
items.answer: Yes! We are 100% digital and serve companies from any state. The entire process is done online, in a practical and secure way.

items.question: How does tax planning work?
items.answer: We thoroughly analyze your company to identify legal opportunities for tax reduction. We evaluate the best tax regime, applicable fiscal benefits, and strategies to optimize your tax burden.

items.question: What is the timeline for company formation?
items.answer: The average timeline is 7 to 15 business days, depending on the type of company and location. We handle all the paperwork for you.

items.question: How do I access the Power BI dashboards?
items.answer: After hiring, you receive access to an exclusive platform where you can view all reports and indicators of your company in real-time, from any device.
